snippet: RaeJanese Chambers, 41, who has schizophrenia, has gained counseling and financial support from the Brooklyn Community Services as part of a program that helps homeless women transition to permanent housing.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services and Transitional Living helps RaeJanese Chambers, who has schizophrenia, with counseling and financial support for permanent housing.
lead_paragraph: RaeJanese Chambers, 41, who has schizophrenia, has gained counseling and financial support from the Brooklyn Community Services as part of a program that helps homeless women transition to permanent housing.

headline.print_headline: A Woman Who Hears Voices, and Is Learning to Listen to the Right One
headline.main: Hearing Voices, and Listening to the Right One
